name: Elections (Amendment) Act, 2019
tagline: Further to amend the Elections Act, 2017 for effective disposal of complaints and appeals.
content:
REGISTERED No.-M 302  L.-7646 
gbt 41584ette of *Mita 11:3 est:i 
EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, MONDAY, MARCH 11, 2019 
PART 
Ads, Ordinances, President's Orders and Regulations 
NATIONAL ASSEMBLY SECRETARIAT 
Islamabad, the 10th March, 2019 
No. F. 22(18)/2018-Legis.--The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on the 8th March, 2019 is 
hereby published for general information:— 
ACT NO. II OF 2019 
AN 
ACT 
further to amend the Elections Act, 2017 
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Elections Act, 2017 
(XXXIII of 2017), for the purpose hereinafter appearing; 
AND WHEREAS existing provision of section 6 (3) of the Elections Act, 
2017 (XXXIII of 2017) authorizes the Election Commission to constitute a bench 
comprising three or more members of the Commission to hear and decide 
(35) 
Price: Rs. 5.00 
[397(2019)/Ex. Gaz.] 
36 	THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., MARCH 11,2019 	[PART I 
complaints, applications, petitions or appeal .  etc. but due to said provision only 
one bench can be constituted since the total number of members of the 
Commission including the Chairman is five. The Commission is, therefore, 
facing immense difficulty in disposing of higher numbers of such complaints, 
petitions or appeal etc. through a single bench. Hence, the instant amendment is 
necessary to take immediate action to facilitate the Commission for constitution 
of more benches to effectively dispose of such complaints, petitions or appeals 
etc.; 
It is hereby enacted as follows:- 
Short title and commencement.—(1) This Act may be called the 
Elections (Amendment) Act, 2019. 
(2) 	It shall come into force at once. 
Amendment of section 6, Act XXXII' of 2017.— In the Elections 
Act, 2017 (XXXII! of 2017), in section 6, in sub-section (3), for the word 
"three", the word "two" shall be substituted. 
TAHIR HUSSAIN, 
Secretary. 
PRINTED BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF PAKISTAN PRESS, ISLAMABAD. 
PUBLISHED BY THE DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI
